entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
